history.proof: intros m n. qsimpl time: 1 use: RIntro.

exceptions.exn: Unable to unify "?A -> ?B -> Prop" with "forall y : B, R n y -> (R1 /\\ R2)%rel n y" as "R n m0" contains local variables.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
B: Type
R2: rel A B
R1: rel A B
R: rel A B

Goal:
RIntro (subrel R R1 /\ subrel R R2) subrel R (R1 /\ R2)%rel

Premises:
RIntro = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) => P -> R m n : forall A B : Type, Prop -> rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop Arguments RIntro {A B}%type_scope _%type_scope _%rel_scope
rel = fun A1 A2 : Type => A1 -> A2 -> Prop : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments rel (_ _)%type_scope
subrel = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) => forall (x : A) (y : B), R1 x y -> R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel (rel A B) (rel A B) Arguments subrel {A B}%type_scope (R1 R2)%rel_scope : rename
rel_union_lub : forall R3 R4 R0 : rel ?A ?B, RIntro (subrel R3 R0 /\ subrel R4 R0) subrel (R3 \/ R4)%rel R0 where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
set_le_subrel = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (HR : subrel R1 R2) (sA : A -> Prop) (sB : B -> Prop) (Hs : set_le R1 sA sB) (x : A) (Hx : sA x) => let e : exists b : B, sB b /\ R1 x b := Hs x Hx in match e with | ex_intro _ y (conj Hy Hxy) => ex_intro (fun b : B => sB b /\ R2 x b) y (conj Hy (HR x y Hxy)) end : forall A B : Type, Monotonic set_le (subrel ++> subrel) Arguments set_le_subrel {A B}%type_scope
rel_inter_subrel_rexists_l : forall R3 R4 R0 : rel ?A ?B, RExists (subrel R3 R0) subrel (R3 /\ R4)%rel R0 where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
rel_inter_subrel_rexists_r : forall R3 R4 R0 : rel ?A ?B, RExists (subrel R4 R0) subrel (R3 /\ R4)%rel R0 where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
subrel_impl_relim : forall (R3 R4 : rel ?A ?B) (x1 x2 : ?A) (y1 y2 : ?B) (P Q : Prop), RElim impl (R3 x1 y1) (R4 x2 y2) P Q -> RElim subrel R3 R4 (x1 = x2 /\ y1 = y2 /\ P) Q where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
rel_union_subrel_rexists_l : forall R0 R3 R4 : rel ?A ?B, RExists (subrel R0 R3) subrel R0 (R3 \/ R4)%rel where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
rel_union_subrel_rexists_r : forall R0 R3 R4 : rel ?A ?B, RExists (subrel R0 R4) subrel R0 (R3 \/ R4)%rel where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
rel_inter_rexists : forall (R3 R4 : rel ?A ?B) (x : ?A) (y : ?B), RExists (R3 x y /\ R4 x y) (R3 /\ R4) x y where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
rel_inter = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => R1 x y /\ R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_inter {A B} (_ _)%rel_scope
subrel_eq : forall R0 : relation ?A, Coreflexive R0 -> Related R0 eq subrel where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
eq_subrel : forall R0 : rel ?A ?A, Reflexive R0 -> Related eq R0 subrel where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
set_ge_subrel = fun (A B : Type) (x y : rel A B) (H : subrel x y) (x0 : A -> Prop) (y0 : B -> Prop) (H0 : set_ge x x0 y0) (b : B) (H1 : y0 b) => (fun H2 : y0 b -> exists a : A, x0 a /\ x a b => (fun H3 : exists a : A, x0 a /\ x a b => ex_ind (fun (x1 : A) (H4 : x0 x1 /\ x x1 b) => and_ind (fun (H5 : x0 x1) (H6 : x x1 b) => ex_intro (fun a : A => x0 a /\ y a b) x1 (conj H5 ((fun _ : forall y1 : B, x x1 y1 -> y x1 y1 => H x1 b H6) (H x1)))) H4) H3) (H2...
rintro = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (RIntro : RIntro P R m n) => RIntro : forall (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B), RIntro P R m n -> P -> R m n Arguments rintro {A B P}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope {m n RIntro}
rdecompose : forall (x : ?A) (z : ?C), ?RAC x z -> exists y : ?B, ?RAB x y /\ ?RBC y z where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?C : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?RAB : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- rel ?A ?B] ?RBC : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- rel ?B ?C] ?RAC : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A...
flip_rintro : forall (R0 : rel ?A ?B) (m : ?B) (n : ?A), RIntro (R0 n m) (flip R0) m n where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
arrow_pointwise_relim : forall (R0 : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A -> ?B1) (g : ?A -> ?B2) (m n : ?A) (P Q : Prop), RElim R0 (f m) (g n) P Q -> RElim (- ==> R0) f g (m = n /\ P) Q where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
arrow_relim : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RB : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2) (m : ?A1) (n : ?A2) (P Q : Prop), RElim RB (f m) (g n) P Q -> RElim (RA ++> RB) f g (RA m n /\ P) Q where ?A1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?A2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A...
arrow_pointwise_rintro : forall (R0 : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A -> ?B1) (g : ?A -> ?B2), RIntro (forall x : ?A, R0 (f x) (g x)) (- ==> R0) f g where ?A : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
option_rel_some_inv : forall (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (x : option A) (y : option B) (a : A), option_rel R x y -> x = Some a -> exists b : B, y = Some b /\ R a b
rel_inter_subrel = fun (A B : Type) (x y : rel A B) (H : subrel x y) (x0 y0 : rel A B) (H0 : subrel x0 y0) (x1 : A) (y1 : B) (H1 : (x /\ x0)%rel x1 y1) => and_ind (fun (H2 : x x1 y1) (H3 : x0 x1 y1) => conj ((fun H4 : forall y2 : B, x0 x1 y2 -> y0 x1 y2 => (fun H5 : x0 x1 y1 -> y0 x1 y1 => (fun _ : y0 x1 y1 => (fun _ : forall y2 : B, x x1 y2 -> y x1 y2 => H x1 y1 H2) (H x1)) (H5 H3)) (H4 y1)) (H0 x1)) ((fun H4 : forall y2 : B...
arrow_rintro : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RB : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2), RIntro (forall (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y)) (RA ++> RB) f g where ?A1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?A2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type]
forallp_relim : forall (R0 : forall (x : ?V1) (x0 : ?V2), rel (?FV1 x) (?FV2 x0)) (f : forall x : ?V1, ?FV1 x) (g : forall x : ?V2, ?FV2 x) (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2) (P Q : Prop), RElim (R0 v1 v2) (f v1) (g v2) P Q ->...-> Type]
rintro_rstep = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (H : RIntro P R m n) => H : forall (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B), RIntro P R m n -> RStep P (R m n) Arguments rintro_rstep {A B P}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope {m n}
forall_pointwise_rintro : forall (FE : forall v : ?V, rel (?FV1 v) (?FV2 v)) (f : forall x : ?V, ?FV1 x) (g : forall x : ?V, ?FV2 x), RIntro (forall v : ?V, FE v (f v) (g v)) (forallr - @ v, FE v) f g where ?V : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- Type] ?FV1 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- ?V -> Type] ?FV2 : [A : Type B : Type R : rel A B R1 : rel A B R2 : rel A B |- ?V -> Type]
subrel_preorder : forall A B : Type, PreOrder subrel

```coq
intros m n.
apply RIntro.
split.
- apply rel_union_subrel_rexists_l with (R0 := R).
  apply rel_inter_subrel_rexists_l with (R0 := R).
  intros x y Hxy.
  apply rel_inter_rexists with (R3 := R1) (R4 := R2).
  assumption.
- apply rel_union_subrel_rexists_r with (R0 := R).
  apply rel_inter_subrel_rexists_r with (R0 := R).
  intros x y Hxy.
  apply rel_inter_rexists with (R3 := R1) (R4 := R2).
  assumption.
Qed.

original: intros m n. apply RIntro. split. - apply rel_union_subrel_rexists_l with (R0 := R). apply rel_inter_subrel_rexists_l with (R0 := R). intros x y Hxy. apply rel_inter_rexists with (R3 := R1) (R4 := R2). auto. - apply rel_union_subrel_rexists_r with (R0 := R). apply rel_inter_subrel_rexists_r with (R0 := R). intros x y Hxy. apply rel_inter_rexists with (R3 := R1) (R4 := R2). auto.
